content: today i am sharing with your my crochet succulent flower i love succulents but keeping in the perfect conditions had not always been my forte as they tend to stretch due to lack a light but to resolve this problem i have created a crochet pattern where you can have a forever succulent in your home and it will always keep its shape make your own crochet succulent flower in any yarn of your choice with smallest crochet hook you can to match your yarn this will ensure you leaf is more sturdy to create the shape of the leaf pattern made using any yarn size of your choice with crochet hook to match your yarn size skill level easy if you have any queries or questions feel free to contact me at any time i am always here & happy to help to get the latest news & updates on moara crochet please follow me on instagram at www instagram com/moara_crochet or like my page at https //www facebook com/moaracrochet this pattern is copyright moara crochet © each pattern has taken many hours to provide clear instructions & been tested if the item is handmade by you you are welcome to sell as many of the finished product as you wish i do ask that you credit me as the designer and provide a link to my ravelry shop if you re selling online thank you roseanna
